faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about Fintri

whatIsFintri.question: What is Fintri?
whatIsFintri.answer: Fintri is a complete budget management platform developed specifically for freelancers and small businesses. Our tool allows you to create, send and track budgets professionally and efficiently, centralizing the entire process in a single platform.

clientManagement.question: How does client management work?
clientManagement.answer: Fintri offers a complete client management system where you can register complete information like name, contact and address, view quote history by client, apply smart filters and search, and maintain an organized database to facilitate future proposals and follow-ups.

quoteTypes.question: What types of quotes can I create?
quoteTypes.answer: Fintri offers two types of quotes: Simple Quote, ideal for basic proposals with total value and general description, and Detailed Quote, perfect for complex projects with specific items, quantities, unit values and automatic calculations. The system automatically detects the type based on content.

pdfGeneration.question: How does PDF generation work?
pdfGeneration.answer: All quotes can be converted to professional PDF with your brand. The system automatically generates a formatted document with company logo, client data, detailed items, calculated values, commercial conditions and expiration date. The PDF is optimized for printing and sharing.

sharingQuotes.question: How can I share my quotes?
sharingQuotes.answer: Fintri offers multiple sharing methods: Secure link that generates a unique link for online viewing, WhatsApp that shares directly via WhatsApp with personalized message, Email that sends via email with professional template, and PDF Download that downloads the file for offline sending. All methods maintain security and professionalism.

pricing.question: What is Fintri's price?
pricing.answer: Fintri offers a single plan for $19/month that includes all features: unlimited quotes, complete client management, PDF generation, link sharing, financial dashboard, priority support and automatic updates. No hidden fees, no surprises. Cancel anytime.

support.question: What kind of support do you offer?
support.answer: We offer complete support through WhatsApp support during business hours, Email with response within 24h and Priority support for active users. Our team is always available to help you get the most out of the platform.

integration.question: Does Fintri integrate with other tools?
integration.answer: Currently, Fintri works as a complete and independent solution. We are always developing new integrations based on user feedback. If you have specific integration needs, contact us to discuss personalized solutions.
